generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with white lane markings, clearly designated for vehicle and pedestrian traffic, fitting the definition of a road.
- sidewalk: A pedestrian walkway is visible on the right side of the image, separated from the road by a curb and featuring a traffic island with grass.
- building: Multiple multi-story structures with windows and commercial signage are visible along the street, qualifying as buildings.
- wall: A section of a stone wall with graffiti is visible on the right side of the image, separate from the main building structure.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and street signs.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible mounted on a pole at the intersection on the right side of the image.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign with a white arrow pointing down and to the right is visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Trees are visible in the background, particularly on the right side of the image.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings in the background.
- person: Two men are walking across the road in the foreground, and other pedestrians are visible in the background.
- car: A white car is visible in the background, parked or moving on the road.
- truck: A white truck is visible on the left side of the image, partially in the frame.
- motorcycle: No motorcycle is visible in the image.
- bicycle: No bicycle is visible in the image.
- bus: No bus is visible in the image.
- train: No train is visible in the image.
- terrain: A small patch of grass is visible on the traffic island, which is part of the terrain.
- rider: No rider is visible in the image.
